channel.title: Just a question
channel.description:
ok so im going to start a 317 project soon
note: uses a script engine :)
so a question... how could i get the coords to be printed out on screen like for the mopar client when you say ::coordson. is there a way to implement it to my client (yes i know there is a way). help pl0x :d

item.title: Just a question
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Try using an outStream.
